title: Morgana Graphical Glitch
body: So I got the Morgana chroma recently and I noticed this weird graphical glitch in Morg's walk cycle. This was naturally frustrating as I had just payed money for these but on further inspection this is actually in her base skin as well, its just more noticeable with the black dress. It would be nice to get this fixed so the chroma doesn't look like butt, thanks.

replies.body:
Hey ParadoxSpace - 

Thanks for the report! I've gone ahead and passed this along to Champion so they can take a look and see what's going on.
